Title: Table No. 21
Writer: Sheershak Anand (story and screenplay), Shantanu Ray Chhibber (story and screenplay), T. Rafael Cimino (novel), Abhijeet Deshpande
Actors: Paresh Rawal, Rajeev Khandelwal, Tina Desai, Dhruv Ganesh
Plot: A couple is drawn into a game show with a whooping winning prize. However the game turns into more than a survival for them with no escape.
